name: fiapi
description: Tool to aid in constructing APIs using files

scripts.test-cov: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --require test/fixtures/ test/support/env --reporter dot --check-leaks --globals 'sandbox' test/ test/acceptance
scripts.test-travis: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --require test/support/env --reporter spec --check-leaks --globals 'sandbox' test/fixtures test/ test/acceptance

author: jabclab
